fields.request: Validate security event logging and GetLog capture
fields.request_details: Use a charge point that can emit SecurityEventNotification and LogStatusNotification messages. Confirm new security events appear in the Security Events changelist with the expected trigger and timestamp. Trigger a GetLog request from the charge point admin, ensure the follow-up LogStatusNotification updates the Log Requests records, and verify the generated log file is attached to the session capture.
